text: @realDonaldTrump Evan McMullin: In the days ahead Trump will ask us to sacrifice the lives of seniors the unwell, & othersvulnerable to COVID-19 to serve his political and other interests We shud reject this proposition. We need to stand together against this pandemic leaving no one behind

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
